title: [QUESTION] or [Error] on Creating PDF
body:
Hi,

I gotten this error when hitting to this line of code:
**using (var pdfCanvas = document.BeginPage(width, height))** 

FYI, document variable is 
--> using (var document = SKDocument.CreatePdf(stream, metadata))


Can someone have a look? It used to work, but not sure what went wrong and suddenly it throwing error.
